actions.description:
### Get vaccinated at your GP surgery

Contact your GP surgery to book an appointment.

### Book an appointment online

You can book an appointment online at some pharmacies, GP surgeries and vaccination centres.

### Get vaccinated without an appointment

You can get an RSV vaccination at some pharmacies without needing an appointment.

You do not need to be registered with a GP to do this.
actions.urlLabel: Find a pharmacy where you can get a free RSV vaccination

actions.description:
### If you think this is incorrect

If you have already had this vaccination or your personal details are wrong, visit our [help and support page](https://www.nhs.uk/nhs-app/nhs-app-help-and-support/vaccinations/check-and-book-an-rsv-vaccination).

processedSuggestions.statusText: You should have the RSV vaccine
